Class KernelUtil

Object
KernelUtil
public class KernelUtil extends Object
Static utility methods for KernelImageN objects.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Michael Bedward

  • Constructor Details

    • KernelUtil

      public KernelUtil()

  • Method Details

    • standardize

      public static KernelImageN standardize(KernelImageN kernel)
      Create a copy of the input kernel with element values standardized to sum to 1.0. The input kernel's dimensions and location of the key element are retained by the new kernel.
      Parameters:
      kernel - the input kernel
      Returns:
      a new KernelImageN object

    • setElement

      public static KernelImageN setElement(KernelImageN kernel, int x, int y, float newValue)
      Creates a new kernel by copying the one provided and setting the element at (x, y) to value.
      Parameters:
      kernel - the existing kernel
      x - element X ordinate
      y - element Y ordinate
      newValue - new element value
      Returns:
      the new kernel
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if kernel is null or x or y are out of bounds

    • kernelToString

      public static String kernelToString(KernelImageN kernel, boolean multiLine)
      A utility function that returns a string representation of a KernelImageN object's data.
      Parameters:
      kernel - the input kernel
      multiLine - if true, each row of kernel data is followed by a newline; if false, the string contains no newlines
      Returns:
      a String
